name: module-federation-react-example
description: Module Federation React example with shared UI components and libraries

scripts.dev: bash -c "pnpm -C host dev & pnpm -C remote dev & wait"
scripts.build: pnpm -C host build && pnpm -C remote build
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run build && pnpm run optimize && npx playwright test
scripts.clean: rimraf dist coverage host/dist remote/dist node_modules/.cache
